name: A. Little Pony and Crystal Mine
statement:
Twilight Sparkle once got a crystal from the Crystal Mine. A crystal of
size ( is odd; ) is an matrix with a diamond inscribed into it.You are
given an odd integer . You need to draw a crystal of size . The diamond
cells of the matrix should be represented by character "". All other
cells of the matrix should be represented by character "". Look at the
examples to understand what you need to draw.
editorial:
Brief description:
Draw the grid graph as the problem said.

Analysis:
Just a few basics of your programming language. It's easy.
